In England, in the seven days to 03 September, there were 183,727 new confirmed cases (324.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 27 August, there were 177,507 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 4% (6,220 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 08 September is 6,102,850 (10,791.9 cases per 100,000 population).
